mapper.select: SELECT b.boardPostNo, m.memNickname, b.memId, b.title, b.createdDate FROM board b JOIN member m ON b.memId = m.memId ORDER BY b.createdDate DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (memId, boardCtgId, title, content, uploadFile) VALUES (#{memId}, #{boardCtgId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{uploadFile})
mapper.select: SELECT b.boardPostNo, b.memId, b.boardCtgId, b.title, b.createdDate, b.content, b.uploadFile, m.memNickname FROM board b JOIN member m ON b.memId = m.memId WHERE b.boardPostNo = #{boardPostNo}
